text: Set of training examples D Set of descriptive features d IF all examples in D belong to the same class C THEN Return a leaf node and label it with class C IF no features left in D THEN Return a leaf node and label it with majority class C of D IF no examples left in D THEN Return a leaf node and label the it with majority class C of examples at t immediate parent node ELSE Select a feature d; from d based on some feature selection criterion Generate a tree node with d; as the test feature FOR EACH value v; of d; Let D; c D contains all examples with d; = v; Build a subtree by applying ID3(D;)
